metadata.title: CVE-2022-42722 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel 5.8 through 5.19.x before 5.19.16, local attackers ableto inject WLAN frames into the mac80211 stack could cause a NULL pointerdereference denial-of-service attack against the beacon protection of P2Pdevices.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
